name: Survival Protocol Robot
description:
A Title inspired by Survival Games, and Legend of Zelda Breath of the Wild. Gather resources, upgrade your abilities, and survive. Will you make friends or end them?

(GIFs coming soon!)

Controls:

WASD - Movement

E - Interact Key (interact with many things, you can also harvest lightning)

I - Inventory

TAB - Walker inventory (when inside walker)

Left mouse - Attack

Spacebar - Teleport

T - Teleport (teleport back when upgraded)

Join our Community:

Follow me on Twitter

When will this project be released?

This game is available now for early access. Help us make this game better to test out new features.

Where is the project right now?

We are currently in early access and are developing new features as we learn from our players. We are integrating animations and getting the sound in place. We also need to integrate the new map and add an ability to add maps into the game

Why Itch.io?

It's free and a great way to get feedback from people to improve our game.
